videos.author: CovertGoBlue
videos.title: SpongeBob SquarePants Commander - best game ever! - WPCS 154
videos.description:
Who lives in a pineapple under the sea? SPONGEBOB SQUAREPANTS! That's right, the Worst Possible has come to Bikini Bottom. Watch the crew take on each other with cards from the SpongeBob SquarePants Secret Lair.

Decklists:
Ben: https://moxfield.com/decks/d3MKBXK4lEm-Hq5ga8H07w
Gina: https://moxfield.com/decks/RM1ZhQHnnkOjro3wuHP3RA
Shea: https://moxfield.com/decks/sGL3yrmEj0ihaEkqqQEk5A
Brent: https://moxfield.com/decks/XezO0Z-Pb0uy06mQjR_SWg
